blogPost.excerpt: Kidato is an online school for K-12 kids in Africa. We started by offering after-school classes but now parents are using us to completely replace brick-and-mortar schools.
blogPost.body: Kidato is an online school for K-12 kids in Africa. We started by offering after-school classes but now parents are using us to completely replace brick-and-mortar schools.
blogPost.title: Kidato - Kidato is an online school for K-12 kids in Africa
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Kidato是一所面向非洲K-12孩子的在线学校。我们一开始是提供课后课程，但现在家长们已经用我们完全取代了实体学校。
localize.tagline: Kidato是一所面向非洲K-12儿童的在线学校。

localize.description: Kidato是一所面向非洲K-12孩子的在線學校。我們一開始是提供課後課程，但現在家長們已經用我們完全取代了實體學校。
localize.tagline: Kidato是一所面向非洲K-12兒童的在線學校。

previous.excerpt: datedropper Javascript is the lightest, the most complete and flexible javascript date picker material UI library. A modern and easy to use datepicker, designed to fit into any layout.
previous.title: dateDropper Javascript - The lightest and the most complete javascript date picker

localize.description: datedropper Javascript是最轻巧、最完整、最灵活的javascript日期采集器素材UI库。一个现代化的、易于使用的日期选择器，设计成适合任何布局。
localize.tagline: 最轻巧、最完整的javascript日期选择器。

localize.description: datedropper Javascript是最輕巧、最完整、最靈活的javascript日期採集器素材UI庫。一個現代化的、易於使用的日期選擇器，設計成適合任何佈局。
localize.tagline: 最輕巧、最完整的javascript日期選擇器。

next.excerpt: Do you miss working in an office? Listen to the sounds of the hit TV show The Office! Check out the product that went viral on reddit with 24K site visits in 2 days 🔥
next.title: Work at Dunder Mifflin - The Office TV show ambient sounds

localize.description: 你怀念在办公室工作的日子吗？听听热播电视剧《办公室》的声音吧！这款产品在reddit上获得了2天24K的网站访问量。看看这款产品在reddit上的病毒式传播，2天内有24K的网站访问量🔥。
localize.tagline: 办公室电视节目的环境声音

localize.description: 你懷念在辦公室工作的日子嗎？聽聽熱播電視劇《辦公室》的聲音吧！這款產品在reddit上獲得了2天24K的網站訪問量。看看這款產品在reddit上的病毒式傳播，2天內有24K的網站訪問量🔥。
localize.tagline: 辦公室電視節目的環境聲音
